alertAcknowledged: Another Responder has acknowledged this request. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
alertAdditionalAlert: An additional {{ alertTypeDisplayName }} alert was generated at {{ deviceDisplayName }}
alertAdditionalAlertAcceptResetRequest:
An additional {{ alertTypeDisplayName }} alert was generated at {{ deviceDisplayName }}.

We notice that many alerts are coming from this sensor. Please respond with 'ok' once you have checked on it or 'reset' to reset the device if you believe these to be false alerts.
alertCompleted: Thank you! This session is now complete. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
alertFallback: An alert to check on {{ deviceDisplayName }} was not responded to. Please check on it.
alertReminder: This is a reminder to check on {{ deviceDisplayName }}
alertStart: This is a {{ alertTypeDisplayName }} alert. Please check on {{ deviceDisplayName }}. Please respond with 'ok' once you have checked on it.
alertStartAcceptResetRequest:
This is a {{ alertTypeDisplayName }} alert. Please check on {{ deviceDisplayName }} .

We notice that many alerts are being sent from this sensor. Please respond with 'ok' once you have checked on it or 'reset' to reset the device if you believe these to be false alerts.
incidentCategorized:
The incident was categorized as {{ incidentCategory }}.

Thank you. This session is now complete. (You don't need to respond to this message.)
incidentCategoryInvalid: Sorry, the incident type wasn't recognized. Please try again.
incidentCategoryRequest:
Once you have responded, please reply with the number that best describes the incident:
{{ incidentCategories }}
resetNoticeToRequester: The Brave Sensor has been reset. No further alerts will be generated until another occupant is detected. Please check the location if needed. Session complete (no reply needed).
resetNoticeToOtherResponders: Another Responder reset the Brave Sensor. No further alerts will be generated until another occupant is detected. Please check the location if needed. Session complete (no response needed).
resetRequestRejected:
You can only reset this Brave Sensor if it's sending too many alerts. We'll notify you when it's possible.

Reply 'ok' once you've checked on it.
sensorRadarDisconnectionInitial: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName}} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has disconnected. Please press the reset button within the circular hole on the Brave Sensor using a pin. If you do not receive a reconnection message within 20 minutes, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
sensorDoorDisconnectionInitial: The Door Contact for {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has disconnected. Please reattach the door contact or replace the battery if necessary. Email clientsupport@brave.coop if a replacement is required.
sensorRadarDisconnectionReminder: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) is still disconnected. Please press the reset button within the circular hole on the Brave Sensor using a pin. If you do not receive a reconnection message within 20 minutes, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
sensorDoorDisconnectionReminder: The Door Contact for {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) is still disconnected. Please reattach the door contact or replace the battery if necessary. Email clientsupport@brave.coop if a replacement is required.
sensorIsTampered: The door contact at {{ deviceDisplayName }} is not fully attached to the door. For a replacement or any questions, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
sensorInactivity: The door contact at {{ deviceDisplayName }} has not detected any activity in a long time please make sure that both parts of the door contact are fully attached to the door. If you require a replacement or have any questions, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
sensorLowBatteryInitial:
The battery for the {{ deviceDisplayName }} door sensor is low, and needs replacing.

To watch a video showing how to replace the battery, go to https://youtu.be/-mfk4-qQc4w
sensorReconnection: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has been reconnected.
durationAlert: {{ deviceDisplayName }} has been occupied for {{ occupancyDuration }} minutes. Reply with '5' or 'ok' to tell us more.
durationAlertSurvey:
Could you please let us know the outcome?
{{ surveyCategoriesForMessage }}
durationAlertSurveyDoorOpened:
We see the door has been opened. Could you please let us know the outcome?
{{ surveyCategoriesForMessage }}
durationAlertSurveyOtherFollowup: Can you please describe what happened?
durationAlertSurveyOccupantOkayFollowup: We will continue to monitor this location. Reply '1' to stop monitoring.
durationAlertSurveyOccupantOkayEnd: You will no longer receive alerts until the next entry. Thank you!
stillnessAlert: {{ deviceDisplayName }} needs a SAFETY CHECK. On your way? Reply with '5' or 'ok'.
stillnessAlertFirstReminder:
1st REMINDER
{{ deviceDisplayName }} needs a SAFETY CHECK. On your way? Reply with '5' or 'ok'.
stillnessAlertSecondReminder:
2nd REMINDER
{{ deviceDisplayName }} needs a SAFETY CHECK. On your way? Reply with '5' or 'ok'.
stillnessAlertThirdReminder:
FINAL REMINDER
{{ deviceDisplayName }} needs a SAFETY CHECK. On your way? Reply with '5' or 'ok'.
stillnessAlertFallback: No response to stillness alerts for {{ deviceDisplayName }}. There will be one final alert.
stillnessAlertFollowup: Thanks, we'll follow up in {{ stillnessAlertFollowupTimer }} minutes.
stillnessAlertSurvey:
Could you please let us know the outcome?
{{ surveyCategoriesForMessage }}
stillnessAlertSurveyOtherFollowup: Can you please describe what happened?
stillnessAlertSurveyOccupantOkayFollowup: We will continue to monitor this location. Reply '1' to stop monitoring.
stillnessAlertSurveyOccupantOkayEnd: You will no longer receive alerts until the next entry. Thank you!
nonAttendingResponderConfirmation: Another responder is attending to this alert. You do not need to reply to this message.
alertRespondedViaTeams: Another responder is attending to this alert via teams. You do not need to reply to this message.
reportIssue:
You can reach us at:
Phone: +18338332100
Email: clientsupport@brave.coop
Thank you!
thankYou: Thank you, monitoring will be paused until the next entry.
doorLowBattery:
The battery for the {{ deviceDisplayName }} door sensor is low, and needs replacing.
To watch a video showing how to replace the battery, go to https://youtu.be/-mfk4-qQc4w.
doorTampered: The door contact at {{ deviceDisplayName }} is not fully attached to the door. For a replacement or any questions, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
doorInactivity: The door contact at {{ deviceDisplayName }} has not detected any activity in a long time. Please make sure that both parts of the door contact are fully attached to the door. If you require a replacement or have any questions, email clientsupport@brave.coop.
deviceDisconnectedInitial: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has disconnected. Please email clientsupport@brave.coop.
deviceDisconnectedReminder: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) is still disconnected. Please email clientsupport@brave.coop.
doorDisconnectedInitial: The door contact for {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has disconnected. Please reattach the door contact or replace the battery if necessary. Email clientsupport@brave.coop if a replacement is required.
doorDisconnectedReminder: The door contact for {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) is still disconnected. Please reattach the door contact or replace the battery if necessary. Email clientsupport@brave.coop if a replacement is required.
deviceReconnected: The Brave Sensor at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has been reconnected.
doorReconnected: The door contact at {{ deviceDisplayName }} ({{ clientDisplayName }}) has been reconnected.
